block_condition.description: If specified, the modifier(s) will only apply to the blocks that fulfills this condition.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the modifier(s) will only apply to the blocks that fulfills this condition.

modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the break speed.
modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the break speed.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the break speed.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the break speed.

hardness_modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the *effective* hardness value of the block while calculating the block's break speed.
hardness_modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the *effective* hardness value of the block while calculating the block's break speed.

hardness_modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the *effective* hardness value of the block while calculating the block's break speed.
hardness_modifiers.markdownDescription: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the *effective* hardness value of the block while calculating the block's break speed.
